1648  private void addReference( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1649                             @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1650                             @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1651                             @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
1652  {
1653    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME, method );
1654    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( component.getElement(),
1655                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
1656                                         Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME,
1657                                         method );
1658    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME, method );
1659    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME, method );
1660    MemberChecks.mustBeAbstract( Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME, method );
1661
1662    final String name = getReferenceName( annotation, method );
1663    final String linkType = getLinkType( method );
1664    final String inverseName;
1665    final Multiplicity inverseMultiplicity;
1666    if ( hasInverse( annotation ) )
1667    {
1668      inverseMultiplicity = getReferenceInverseMultiplicity( annotation );
1669      inverseName = getReferenceInverseName( component, annotation, method, inverseMultiplicity );
1670      final TypeMirror returnType = method.getReturnType();
1671      if ( !( returnType instanceof DeclaredType ) ||
1672           !AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( ( (DeclaredType) returnType ).asElement(),
1673                                                 Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) )
1674      {
1675        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target expected to return a type annotated with " +
1676                                      MemberChecks.toSimpleName( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) +
1677                                      " if there is an inverse reference", method );
1678      }
1679    }
1680    else
1681    {
1682      inverseName = null;
1683      inverseMultiplicity = null;
1684    }
1685    final ReferenceDescriptor descriptor = component.findOrCreateReference( name );
1686    descriptor.setMethod( method, methodType, linkType, inverseName, inverseMultiplicity );
1687    verifyMultiplicityOfAssociatedInverseMethod( component, descriptor );
1688  }
1689
1690  private boolean hasInverse( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation )
1691  {
1692    final VariableElement variableElement = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "inverse" );
1693    return switch ( variableElement.getSimpleName().toString() )
1694    {
1695      case "ENABLE" -> true;
1696      case "DISABLE" -> false;
1697      default -> null != AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( annotation, "inverseName" ) ||
1698                 null != AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( annotation, "inverseMultiplicity" );
1699    };
1700  }
1701
1702  private void verifyMultiplicityOfAssociatedReferenceMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1703                                                              @Nonnull final InverseDescriptor descriptor )
1704  {
1705    final Multiplicity multiplicity =
1706      ElementsUtil
1707        .getMethods( descriptor.getTargetType(),
1708                     processingEnv.getElementUtils(),
1709                     processingEnv.getTypeUtils() )
1710        .stream()
1711        .map( m -> {
1712          final AnnotationMirror a =
1713            AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( m, Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME );
1714          if ( null != a && getReferenceName( a, m ).equals( descriptor.getReferenceName() ) )
1715          {
1716            if ( null == AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( a, "inverse" ) &&
1717                 null == AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( a, "inverseName" ) &&
1718                 null == AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( a, "inverseMultiplicity" ) )
1719            {
1720              throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target found an associated @Reference on the method '" +
1721                                            m.getSimpleName() + "' on type '" +
1722                                            descriptor.getTargetType().getQualifiedName() + "' but the " +
1723                                            "annotation has not configured an inverse.",
1724                                            descriptor.getObservable().getGetter() );
1725            }
1726            ensureTargetTypeAligns( component, descriptor, m.getReturnType() );
1727            return getReferenceInverseMultiplicity( a );
1728          }
1729          else
1730          {
1731            return null;
1732          }
1733        } )
1734        .filter( Objects::nonNull )
1735        .findAny()
1736        .orElse( null );
1737    if ( null == multiplicity )
1738    {
1739      throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target expected to find an associated @Reference annotation with " +
1740                                    "a name parameter equal to '" + descriptor.getReferenceName() + "' on class " +
1741                                    descriptor.getTargetType().getQualifiedName() + " but is unable to " +
1742                                    "locate a matching method.", descriptor.getObservable().getGetter() );
1743    }
1744
1745    if ( descriptor.getMultiplicity() != multiplicity )
1746    {
1747      throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target has a multiplicity of " + descriptor.getMultiplicity() +
1748                                    " but that associated @Reference has a multiplicity of " + multiplicity +
1749                                    ". The multiplicity must align.", descriptor.getObservable().getGetter() );
1750    }
1751  }
1752
1753  @Nonnull
1754  private String getLinkType( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1755  {
1756    return AnnotationsUtil.getEnumAnnotationParameter( method, Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME, "load" );
1757  }
1758
1759  @Nonnull
1760  private String getReferenceName( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1761                                   @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1762  {
1763    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
1764    final String name;
1765    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
1766    {
1767      final String candidate = deriveName( method, GETTER_PATTERN, declaredName );
1768      if ( null == candidate )
1769      {
1770        name = method.getSimpleName().toString();
1771      }
1772      else
1773      {
1774        name = candidate;
1775      }
1776    }
1777    else
1778    {
1779      name = declaredName;
1780      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
1781      {
1782        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
1783                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
1784      }
1785      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
1786      {
1787        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
1788                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
1789      }
1790    }
1791    return name;
1792  }
1793
1794  @Nonnull
1795  private Multiplicity getReferenceInverseMultiplicity( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation )
1796  {
1797    final VariableElement variableElement =
1798      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "inverseMultiplicity" );
1799    return switch ( variableElement.getSimpleName().toString() )
1800    {
1801      case "MANY" -> Multiplicity.MANY;
1802      case "ONE" -> Multiplicity.ONE;
1803      default -> Multiplicity.ZERO_OR_ONE;
1804    };
1805  }
1806
1807  @Nonnull
1808  private String getReferenceInverseName( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1809                                          @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1810                                          @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1811                                          @Nonnull final Multiplicity multiplicity )
1812  {
1813    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "inverseName" );
1814    final String name;
1815    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
1816    {
1817      final String baseName = component.getElement().getSimpleName().toString();
1818      return firstCharacterToLowerCase( baseName ) + ( Multiplicity.MANY == multiplicity ? "s" : "" );
1819    }
1820    else
1821    {
1822      name = declaredName;
1823      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
1824      {
1825        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target specified an invalid inverseName '" + name + "'. The " +
1826                                      "inverseName must be a valid java identifier.", method );
1827      }
1828      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
1829      {
1830        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target specified an invalid inverseName '" + name + "'. The " +
1831                                      "inverseName must not be a java keyword.", method );
1832      }
1833    }
1834    return name;
1835  }
1836
1837  private void ensureTargetTypeAligns( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1838                                       @Nonnull final ReferenceDescriptor descriptor,
1839                                       @Nonnull final TypeMirror target )
1840  {
1841    if ( !processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isSameType( target, component.getElement().asType() ) )
1842    {
1843      throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target expected to find an associated @Inverse annotation with " +
1844                                    "a target type equal to " + component.getElement().getQualifiedName() + " but " +
1845                                    "the actual target type is " + target, descriptor.getMethod() );
1846    }
1847  }
1848
1849  private void verifyMultiplicityOfAssociatedInverseMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1850                                                            @Nonnull final ReferenceDescriptor descriptor )
1851  {
1852    final TypeElement element =
1853      (TypeElement) processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( descriptor.getMethod().getReturnType() );
1854    final String defaultInverseName =
1855      descriptor.hasInverse() ?
1856      null :
1857      firstCharacterToLowerCase( component.getElement().getSimpleName().toString() ) + "s";
1858    final Multiplicity multiplicity =
1859      ElementsUtil
1860        .getMethods( element, processingEnv.getElementUtils(), processingEnv.getTypeUtils() )
1861        .stream()
1862        .map( m -> {
1863          final AnnotationMirror a = AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( m, Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME );
1864          if ( null == a )
1865          {
1866            return null;
1867          }
1868          final String inverseName = getInverseName( a, m );
1869          if ( !descriptor.hasInverse() && inverseName.equals( defaultInverseName ) )
1870          {
1871            throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target has not configured an inverse but there is an " +
1872                                          "associated @Inverse annotated method named '" + m.getSimpleName() +
1873                                          "' on type '" + element.getQualifiedName() + "'.",
1874                                          descriptor.getMethod() );
1875          }
1876          if ( descriptor.hasInverse() && inverseName.equals( descriptor.getInverseName() ) )
1877          {
1878            final TypeElement target = getInverseManyTypeTarget( m );
1879            if ( null != target )
1880            {
1881              ensureTargetTypeAligns( component, descriptor, target.asType() );
1882              return Multiplicity.MANY;
1883            }
1884            else
1885            {
1886              ensureTargetTypeAligns( component, descriptor, m.getReturnType() );
1887              return AnnotationsUtil.hasNonnullAnnotation( m ) ? Multiplicity.ONE : Multiplicity.ZERO_OR_ONE;
1888            }
1889          }
1890          else
1891          {
1892            return null;
1893          }
1894        } )
1895        .filter( Objects::nonNull )
1896        .findAny()
1897        .orElse( null );
1898
1899    if ( descriptor.hasInverse() )
1900    {
1901      if ( null == multiplicity )
1902      {
1903        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target expected to find an associated @Inverse annotation " +
1904                                      "with a name parameter equal to '" + descriptor.getInverseName() + "' on " +
1905                                      "class " + descriptor.getMethod().getReturnType() + " but is unable to " +
1906                                      "locate a matching method.", descriptor.getMethod() );
1907      }
1908
1909      final Multiplicity inverseMultiplicity = descriptor.getInverseMultiplicity();
1910      if ( inverseMultiplicity != multiplicity )
1911      {
1912        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target has an inverseMultiplicity of " + inverseMultiplicity +
1913                                      " but that associated @Inverse has a multiplicity of " + multiplicity +
1914                                      ". The multiplicity must align.", descriptor.getMethod() );
1915      }
1916    }
1917  }
1918
1919  @Nonnull
1920  private DependencyDescriptor createMethodDependencyDescriptor( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
1921                                                                 @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1922  {
1923    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME, method );
1924    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
1925                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
1926                                         Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
1927                                         method );
1928    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME, method );
1929    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME, method );
1930
1931    final boolean validateTypeAtRuntime =
1932      (Boolean) AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValue( method,
1933                                                    Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
1934                                                    "validateTypeAtRuntime" ).getValue();
1935
1936    final TypeMirror type = method.getReturnType();
1937    if ( TypeKind.DECLARED != type.getKind() )
1938    {
1939      throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentDependency target must return a non-primitive value", method );
1940    }
1941    if ( !validateTypeAtRuntime )
1942    {
1943      final TypeElement disposeNotifier = getTypeElement( Constants.DISPOSE_NOTIFIER_CLASSNAME );
1944      if ( !processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isAssignable( type, disposeNotifier.asType() ) )
1945      {
1946        final TypeElement typeElement = (TypeElement) processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( type );
1947        if ( !isActAsComponentAnnotated( typeElement ) && !isDisposeTrackableComponent( typeElement ) )
1948        {
1949          throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentDependency target must return an instance compatible with " +
1950                                        Constants.DISPOSE_NOTIFIER_CLASSNAME + " or a type annotated " +
1951                                        "with @ArezComponent(disposeNotifier=ENABLE) or @ActAsComponent", method );
1952        }
1953      }
1954    }
1955
1956    final boolean cascade = isActionCascade( method );
1957    return new DependencyDescriptor( descriptor, method, cascade );
1958  }
1959
1960  @Nonnull
1961  private DependencyDescriptor createFieldDependencyDescriptor( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
1962                                                                @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
1963  {
1964    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
1965                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
1966                                         Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
1967                                         field );
1968    MemberChecks.mustBeFinal( Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME, field );
1969
1970    final boolean validateTypeAtRuntime =
1971      (Boolean) AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValue( field,
1972                                                    Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
1973                                                    "validateTypeAtRuntime" ).getValue();
1974
1975    final TypeMirror type = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asMemberOf( descriptor.asDeclaredType(), field );
1976    if ( TypeKind.TYPEVAR != type.getKind() && TypeKind.DECLARED != type.getKind() )
1977    {
1978      throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentDependency target must be a non-primitive value", field );
1979    }
1980    if ( !validateTypeAtRuntime )
1981    {
1982      final TypeElement disposeNotifier = getTypeElement( Constants.DISPOSE_NOTIFIER_CLASSNAME );
1983      if ( !processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isAssignable( type, disposeNotifier.asType() ) )
1984      {
1985        final Element element = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( type );
1986        if ( !( element instanceof TypeElement ) ||
1987             !isActAsComponentAnnotated( (TypeElement) element ) &&
1988             !isDisposeTrackableComponent( (TypeElement) element ) )
1989        {
1990          throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentDependency target must be an instance compatible with " +
1991                                        Constants.DISPOSE_NOTIFIER_CLASSNAME + " or a type annotated " +
1992                                        "with @ArezComponent(disposeNotifier=ENABLE) or @ActAsComponent", field );
1993        }
1994      }
1995    }
1996
1997    if ( !isActionCascade( field ) )
1998    {
1999      throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentDependency target defined an action of 'SET_NULL' but the " +
2000                                    "dependency is on a final field and can not be set to null.", field );
2001
2002    }
2003
2004    return new DependencyDescriptor( descriptor, field );
2005  }
2006
2007  private boolean isActionCascade( @Nonnull final Element method )
2008  {
2009    final String value =
2010      AnnotationsUtil.getEnumAnnotationParameter( method,
2011                                                  Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
2012                                                  "action" );
2013    return "CASCADE".equals( value );
2014  }
2015
2016  @SuppressWarnings( "BooleanMethodIsAlwaysInverted" )
2017  private boolean isActAsComponentAnnotated( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
2018  {
2019    return AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.ACT_AS_COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
2020  }
2021
2022  @SuppressWarnings( "BooleanMethodIsAlwaysInverted" )
2023  private boolean isDisposeTrackableComponent( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
2024  {
2025    return AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) &&
2026           isDisposableTrackableRequired( typeElement );
2027  }
2028
2029  @Nonnull
2030  private ComponentDescriptor parse( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
2031    throws ProcessorException
2032  {
2033    if ( ElementKind.CLASS != typeElement.getKind() && ElementKind.INTERFACE != typeElement.getKind() )
2034    {
2035      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target must be a class or an interface", typeElement );
2036    }
2037    else if ( typeElement.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.FINAL ) )
2038    {
2039      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target must not be final", typeElement );
2040    }
2041    else if ( ElementsUtil.isNonStaticNestedClass( typeElement ) )
2042    {
2043      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target must not be a non-static nested class", typeElement );
2044    }
2045    final AnnotationMirror arezComponent =
2046      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationByType( typeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
2047    final String declaredName = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "name" );
2048    final boolean disposeOnDeactivate = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "disposeOnDeactivate" );
2049    final boolean observableFlag = isComponentObservableRequired( arezComponent, disposeOnDeactivate );
2050    final boolean service = isService( typeElement );
2051    final boolean disposeNotifierFlag = isDisposableTrackableRequired( typeElement );
2052    final boolean allowEmpty = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "allowEmpty" );
2053    final List<VariableElement> fields = ElementsUtil.getFields( typeElement );
2054    ensureNoFieldInjections( fields );
2055    ensureNoMethodInjections( typeElement );
2056    final boolean sting = isStingIntegrationEnabled( arezComponent, service );
2057
2058    final AnnotationValue defaultReadOutsideTransaction =
2059      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( arezComponent, "defaultReadOutsideTransaction" );
2060    final AnnotationValue defaultWriteOutsideTransaction =
2061      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( arezComponent, "defaultWriteOutsideTransaction" );
2062
2063    final boolean requireEquals = isEqualsRequired( arezComponent );
2064    final boolean requireVerify = isVerifyRequired( arezComponent, typeElement );
2065
2066    if ( !typeElement.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.ABSTRACT ) )
2067    {
2068      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target must be abstract", typeElement );
2069    }
2070
2071    final String name =
2072      Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) ?
2073      typeElement.getQualifiedName().toString().replace( ".", "_" ) :
2074      declaredName;
2075
2076    if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
2077    {
2078      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2079                                    "name must be a valid java identifier.", typeElement );
2080    }
2081    else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
2082    {
2083      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2084                                    "name must not be a java keyword.", typeElement );
2085    }
2086
2087    verifyConstructors( typeElement, sting );
2088
2089    if ( sting && !( (DeclaredType) typeElement.asType() ).getTypeArguments().isEmpty() )
2090    {
2091      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2092                                                          "enable sting integration and be a parameterized type" ),
2093                                    typeElement );
2094    }
2095    if ( !sting && AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_EAGER ) )
2096    {
2097      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2098                                                          "disable sting integration and be annotated with " +
2099                                                          Constants.STING_EAGER ),
2100                                    typeElement );
2101    }
2102    if ( !sting && AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_TYPED ) )
2103    {
2104      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2105                                                          "disable sting integration and be annotated with " +
2106                                                          Constants.STING_TYPED ),
2107                                    typeElement );
2108    }
2109    if ( !sting && AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_NAMED ) )
2110    {
2111      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2112                                                          "disable sting integration and be annotated with " +
2113                                                          Constants.STING_NAMED ),
2114                                    typeElement );
2115    }
2116    if ( !sting && AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_CONTRIBUTE_TO ) )
2117    {
2118      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2119                                                          "disable sting integration and be annotated with " +
2120                                                          Constants.STING_CONTRIBUTE_TO ),
2121                                    typeElement );
2122    }
2123
2124    if ( !observableFlag && disposeOnDeactivate )
2125    {
2126      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has specified observable = DISABLE and " +
2127                                    "disposeOnDeactivate = true which is not a valid combination", typeElement );
2128    }
2129
2130    if ( isWarningNotSuppressed( typeElement, Constants.WARNING_EXTENDS_COMPONENT ) )
2131    {
2132      TypeMirror parent = typeElement.getSuperclass();
2133      while ( null != parent )
2134      {
2135        final Element parentElement = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( parent );
2136        final TypeElement parentTypeElement =
2137          null != parentElement && ElementKind.CLASS == parentElement.getKind() ? (TypeElement) parentElement : null;
2138
2139        if ( null != parentTypeElement &&
2140             AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( parentTypeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) )
2141        {
2142          final String message =
2143            MemberChecks.shouldNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2144                                    "extend a class annotated with the " + Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME +
2145                                    " annotation. " + suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_EXTENDS_COMPONENT ) );
2146          processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, typeElement );
2147        }
2148        parent = null != parentTypeElement ? parentTypeElement.getSuperclass() : null;
2149      }
2150    }
2151
2152    final List<ExecutableElement> methods =
2153      ElementsUtil.getMethods( typeElement, processingEnv.getElementUtils(), processingEnv.getTypeUtils(), true );
2154    final boolean generateToString = methods.stream().
2155      noneMatch( m -> m.getSimpleName().toString().equals( "toString" ) &&
2156                      m.getParameters().isEmpty() &&
2157                      !( m.getEnclosingElement().getSimpleName().toString().equals( "Object" ) &&
2158                         "java.lang".equals( processingEnv
2159                                               .getElementUtils()
2160                                               .getPackageOf( m.getEnclosingElement() )
2161                                               .getQualifiedName()
2162                                               .toString() ) ) );
2163
2164    final String priority = getDefaultPriority( arezComponent );
2165    final Priority defaultPriority =
2166      null == priority ? null : "DEFAULT".equals( priority ) ? Priority.NORMAL : Priority.valueOf( priority );
2167
2168    final String defaultReadOutsideTransactionValue =
2169      null == defaultReadOutsideTransaction ?
2170      null :
2171      ( (VariableElement) defaultReadOutsideTransaction.getValue() ).getSimpleName().toString();
2172    final String defaultWriteOutsideTransactionValue =
2173      null == defaultWriteOutsideTransaction ?
2174      null :
2175      ( (VariableElement) defaultWriteOutsideTransaction.getValue() ).getSimpleName().toString();
2176
2177    final ComponentDescriptor descriptor =
2178      new ComponentDescriptor( name,
2179                               defaultPriority,
2180                               observableFlag,
2181                               disposeNotifierFlag,
2182                               disposeOnDeactivate,
2183                               sting,
2184                               requireEquals,
2185                               requireVerify,
2186                               generateToString,
2187                               typeElement,
2188                               defaultReadOutsideTransactionValue,
2189                               defaultWriteOutsideTransactionValue );
2190
2191    analyzeCandidateMethods( descriptor, methods, processingEnv.getTypeUtils() );
2192    validate( allowEmpty, descriptor );
2193
2194    for ( final ObservableDescriptor observable : descriptor.getObservables().values() )
2195    {
2196      if ( observable.expectSetter() )
2197      {
2198        final TypeMirror returnType = observable.getGetterType().getReturnType();
2199        final TypeMirror parameterType = observable.getSetterType().getParameterTypes().get( 0 );
2200        if ( !processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isSameType( parameterType, returnType ) &&
2201             !parameterType.toString().equals( returnType.toString() ) )
2202        {
2203          throw new ProcessorException( "@Observable property defines a setter and getter with different types." +
2204                                        " Getter type: " + returnType + " Setter type: " + parameterType + ".",
2205                                        observable.getGetter() );
2206        }
2207      }
2208    }
2209
2210    final boolean idRequired = isIdRequired( arezComponent );
2211    descriptor.setIdRequired( idRequired );
2212    if ( !idRequired )
2213    {
2214      if ( descriptor.hasComponentIdMethod() )
2215      {
2216        throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has specified the idRequired = DISABLE " +
2217                                      "annotation parameter but also has annotated a method with @ComponentId " +
2218                                      "that requires idRequired = ENABLE.", typeElement );
2219      }
2220      if ( !descriptor.getComponentIdRefs().isEmpty() )
2221      {
2222        throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has specified the idRequired = DISABLE " +
2223                                      "annotation parameter but also has annotated a method with @ComponentIdRef " +
2224                                      "that requires idRequired = ENABLE.", typeElement );
2225      }
2226      if ( !descriptor.getInverses().isEmpty() )
2227      {
2228        throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has specified the idRequired = DISABLE " +
2229                                      "annotation parameter but also has annotated a method with @Inverse " +
2230                                      "that requires idRequired = ENABLE.", typeElement );
2231      }
2232    }
2233
2234    warnOnUnmanagedComponentReferences( descriptor, fields );
2235
2236    return descriptor;
2237  }
2238
2239  private boolean isStingIntegrationEnabled( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent, final boolean service )
2240  {
2241    final VariableElement parameter = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "sting" );
2242    final String value = parameter.getSimpleName().toString();
2243    return "ENABLE".equals( value ) ||
2244           ( "AUTODETECT".equals( value ) &&
2245             service &&
2246             null != findTypeElement( Constants.STING_INJECTOR ) );
2247  }
2248
2249  private void verifyConstructors( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement, final boolean sting )
2250  {
2251    final List<ExecutableElement> constructors = ElementsUtil.getConstructors( typeElement );
2252    if ( constructors.size() > 1 )
2253    {
2254      if ( sting )
2255      {
2256        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2257                                                            "enable sting integration and have multiple constructors" ),
2258                                      typeElement );
2259      }
2260    }
2261
2262    for ( final ExecutableElement constructor : constructors )
2263    {
2264      if ( constructor.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.PROTECTED ) &&
2265           isWarningNotSuppressed( constructor, Constants.WARNING_PROTECTED_CONSTRUCTOR ) )
2266      {
2267        final String message =
2268          MemberChecks.should( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2269                               "have a package access constructor. " +
2270                               suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_PROTECTED_CONSTRUCTOR ) );
2271        processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, constructor );
2272      }
2273      verifyConstructorParameters( constructor, sting );
2274    }
2275  }
2276
2277  private void verifyConstructorParameters( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement constructor, final boolean sting )
2278  {
2279    for ( final VariableElement parameter : constructor.getParameters() )
2280    {
2281      final TypeMirror type = parameter.asType();
2282      if ( sting && TypesUtil.containsArrayType( type ) )
2283      {
2284        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2285                                                            "enable sting integration and contain a constructor with a parameter that contains an array type" ),
2286                                      parameter );
2287      }
2288      else if ( sting && TypesUtil.containsWildcard( type ) )
2289      {
2290        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2291                                                            "enable sting integration and contain a constructor with a parameter that contains a wildcard type parameter" ),
2292                                      parameter );
2293      }
2294      else if ( sting && TypesUtil.containsRawType( type ) )
2295      {
2296        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2297                                                            "enable sting integration and contain a constructor with a parameter that contains a raw type" ),
2298                                      parameter );
2299      }
2300      else if ( !sting && AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( parameter, Constants.STING_NAMED ) )
2301      {
2302        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2303                                                            "disable sting integration and contain a constructor with a parameter that is annotated with the " +
2304                                                            Constants.STING_NAMED + " annotation" ),
2305                                      parameter );
2306      }
2307      else if ( sting && TypeKind.DECLARED == type.getKind() && !( (DeclaredType) type ).getTypeArguments().isEmpty() )
2308      {
2309        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2310                                                            "enable sting integration and contain a constructor with a parameter that contains a parameterized type" ),
2311                                      parameter );
2312      }
2313    }
2314  }
2315
2316  private void ensureNoFieldInjections( @Nonnull final List<VariableElement> fields )
2317  {
2318    for ( final VariableElement field : fields )
2319    {
2320      if ( hasInjectAnnotation( field ) )
2321      {
2322        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2323                                                            "contain fields annotated by the " +
2324                                                            Constants.INJECT_CLASSNAME +
2325                                                            " annotation. Use constructor injection instead" ),
2326                                      field );
2327      }
2328    }
2329  }
2330
2331  private void ensureNoMethodInjections( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
2332  {
2333    final List<ExecutableElement> methods =
2334      ElementsUtil.getMethods( typeElement, processingEnv.getElementUtils(), processingEnv.getTypeUtils() );
2335    for ( final ExecutableElement method : methods )
2336    {
2337      if ( hasInjectAnnotation( method ) )
2338      {
2339        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2340                                                            "contain methods annotated by the " +
2341                                                            Constants.INJECT_CLASSNAME +
2342                                                            " annotation. Use constructor injection instead" ),
2343                                      method );
2344      }
2345    }
2346  }
2347
2348  private void analyzeCandidateMethods( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor componentDescriptor,
2349                                        @Nonnull final List<ExecutableElement> methods,
2350                                        @Nonnull final Types typeUtils )
2351    throws ProcessorException
2352  {
2353    for ( final ExecutableElement method : methods )
2354    {
2355      final String methodName = method.getSimpleName().toString();
2356      if ( AREZ_SPECIAL_METHODS.contains( methodName ) && method.getParameters().isEmpty() )
2357      {
2358        throw new ProcessorException( "Method defined on a class annotated by @ArezComponent uses a name " +
2359                                      "reserved by Arez", method );
2360      }
2361      else if ( methodName.startsWith( ComponentGenerator.FIELD_PREFIX ) ||
2362                methodName.startsWith( ComponentGenerator.OBSERVABLE_DATA_FIELD_PREFIX ) ||
2363                methodName.startsWith( ComponentGenerator.REFERENCE_FIELD_PREFIX ) ||
2364                methodName.startsWith( ComponentGenerator.FRAMEWORK_PREFIX ) )
2365      {
2366        throw new ProcessorException( "Method defined on a class annotated by @ArezComponent uses a name " +
2367                                      "with a prefix reserved by Arez", method );
2368      }
2369    }
2370    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> getters = new HashMap<>();
2371    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> captures = new HashMap<>();
2372    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> pushes = new HashMap<>();
2373    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> pops = new HashMap<>();
2374    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> setters = new HashMap<>();
2375    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> observes = new HashMap<>();
2376    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> onDepsChanges = new HashMap<>();
2377    for ( final ExecutableElement method : methods )
2378    {
2379      final ExecutableType methodType =
2380        (ExecutableType) typeUtils.asMemberOf( (DeclaredType) componentDescriptor.getElement().asType(), method );
2381      if ( !analyzeMethod( componentDescriptor, method, methodType ) )
2382      {
2383        /*
2384         * If we get here the method was not annotated so we can try to detect if it is a
2385         * candidate arez method in case some arez annotations are implied via naming conventions.
2386         */
2387        if ( method.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.STATIC ) )
2388        {
2389          continue;
2390        }
2391
2392        final CandidateMethod candidateMethod = new CandidateMethod( method, methodType );
2393        final boolean voidReturn = method.getReturnType().getKind() == TypeKind.VOID;
2394        final int parameterCount = method.getParameters().size();
2395        String name;
2396
2397        name = deriveName( method, PUSH_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2398        if ( voidReturn && 1 == parameterCount && null != name )
2399        {
2400          pushes.put( name, candidateMethod );
2401          continue;
2402        }
2403        name = deriveName( method, POP_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2404        if ( voidReturn && 1 == parameterCount && null != name )
2405        {
2406          pops.put( name, candidateMethod );
2407          continue;
2408        }
2409        name = deriveName( method, CAPTURE_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2410        if ( !voidReturn && 0 == parameterCount && null != name )
2411        {
2412          captures.put( name, candidateMethod );
2413          continue;
2414        }
2415
2416        if ( !method.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.FINAL ) )
2417        {
2418          name = deriveName( method, SETTER_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2419          if ( voidReturn && 1 == parameterCount && null != name )
2420          {
2421            setters.put( name, candidateMethod );
2422            continue;
2423          }
2424          name = deriveName( method, ISSER_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2425          if ( !voidReturn && 0 == parameterCount && null != name )
2426          {
2427            getters.put( name, candidateMethod );
2428            continue;
2429          }
2430          name = deriveName( method, GETTER_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2431          if ( !voidReturn && 0 == parameterCount && null != name )
2432          {
2433            getters.put( name, candidateMethod );
2434            continue;
2435          }
2436        }
2437        name = deriveName( method, ON_DEPS_CHANGE_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2438        if ( voidReturn && null != name )
2439        {
2440          if ( 0 == parameterCount ||
2441               (
2442                 1 == parameterCount &&
2443                 Constants.OBSERVER_CLASSNAME.equals( method.getParameters().get( 0 ).asType().toString() )
2444               )
2445          )
2446          {
2447            onDepsChanges.put( name, candidateMethod );
2448            continue;
2449          }
2450        }
2451
2452        final String methodName = method.getSimpleName().toString();
2453        if ( !OBJECT_METHODS.contains( methodName ) )
2454        {
2455          observes.put( methodName, candidateMethod );
2456        }
2457      }
2458    }
2459
2460    linkUnAnnotatedObservables( componentDescriptor, getters, setters );
2461    linkUnAnnotatedObserves( componentDescriptor, observes, onDepsChanges );
2462    linkUnMemoizeContextParameters( componentDescriptor, captures, pushes, pops );
2463    linkObserverRefs( componentDescriptor );
2464    linkCascadeDisposeObservables( componentDescriptor );
2465    linkCascadeDisposeReferences( componentDescriptor );
2466
2467    // CascadeDispose returned false but it was actually processed so lets remove them from getters set
2468
2469    componentDescriptor.getCascadeDisposes().keySet().forEach( method -> {
2470      for ( final Map.Entry<String, CandidateMethod> entry : new HashMap<>( getters ).entrySet() )
2471      {
2472        if ( method.equals( entry.getValue().getMethod() ) )
2473        {
2474          getters.remove( entry.getKey() );
2475        }
2476      }
2477    } );
2478
2479    linkMemoizeContextParametersToMemoizes( componentDescriptor );
2480
2481    linkDependencies( componentDescriptor, getters.values() );
2482
2483    autodetectObservableInitializers( componentDescriptor );
2484
2485    /*
2486     * All of the maps will have called remove() for all matching candidates.
2487     * Thus any left are the non-arez methods.
2488     */
2489
2490    ensureNoAbstractMethods( componentDescriptor, getters.values() );
2491    ensureNoAbstractMethods( componentDescriptor, setters.values() );
2492    ensureNoAbstractMethods( componentDescriptor, observes.values() );
2493    ensureNoAbstractMethods( componentDescriptor, onDepsChanges.values() );
2494
2495    processCascadeDisposeFields( componentDescriptor );
2496    processComponentDependencyFields( componentDescriptor );
2497  }
2498
2499  private static void linkMemoizeContextParametersToMemoizes( final @Nonnull ComponentDescriptor componentDescriptor )
2500  {
2501    // Link MemoizeContextParameters to associated Memoize descriptors
2502    componentDescriptor
2503      .getMemoizes()
2504      .values()
2505      .forEach( m ->
2506                  componentDescriptor
2507                    .getMemoizeContextParameters()
2508                    .values()
2509                    .forEach( p -> p.tryMatchMemoizeDescriptor( m ) ) );
2510  }
2511
2512  private void linkUnMemoizeContextParameters( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor componentDescriptor,
2513                                               @Nonnull final Map<String, CandidateMethod> captures,
2514                                               @Nonnull final Map<String, CandidateMethod> pushes,
2515                                               @Nonnull final Map<String, CandidateMethod> pops )
2516  {
2517    final var parameters = componentDescriptor.getMemoizeContextParameters().values();
2518    for ( final var parameter : parameters )
2519    {
2520      if ( !parameter.hasCapture() )
2521      {
2522        final CandidateMethod capture = captures.remove( parameter.getName() );
2523        if ( null != capture )
2524        {
2525          parameter.linkUnAnnotatedCapture( capture.getMethod(), capture.getMethodType() );
2526        }
2527      }
2528      if ( !parameter.hasPop() )
2529      {
2530        final CandidateMethod pop = pops.remove( parameter.getName() );
2531        if ( null != pop )
2532        {
2533          parameter.linkUnAnnotatedPop( pop.getMethod(), pop.getMethodType() );
2534        }
2535      }
2536      if ( !parameter.hasPush() )
2537      {
2538        final CandidateMethod push = pushes.remove( parameter.getName() );
2539        if ( null != push )
2540        {
2541          parameter.linkUnAnnotatedPush( push.getMethod(), push.getMethodType() );
2542        }
2543      }
2544    }
2545  }
2546
2547  private void ensureNoAbstractMethods( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor componentDescriptor,
2548                                        @Nonnull final Collection<CandidateMethod> candidateMethods )
2549  {
2550    candidateMethods
2551      .stream()
2552      .map( CandidateMethod::getMethod )
2553      .filter( m -> m.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.ABSTRACT ) )
2554      .forEach( m -> {
2555        throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has an abstract method not implemented by " +
2556                                      "framework. The method is named " + m.getSimpleName(),
2557                                      componentDescriptor.getElement() );
2558      } );
2559  }
2560
2561  private boolean analyzeMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2562                                 @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
2563                                 @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
2564    throws ProcessorException
2565  {
2566    emitWarningForUnnecessaryProtectedMethod( descriptor, method );
2567    emitWarningForUnnecessaryFinalMethod( descriptor, method );
2568    verifyNoDuplicateAnnotations( method );
2569
2570    final AnnotationMirror action =
2571      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.ACTION_CLASSNAME );
2572    final AnnotationMirror jaxWsAction =
2573      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.JAX_WS_ACTION_CLASSNAME );
2574    final AnnotationMirror observed =
2575      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.OBSERVE_CLASSNAME );
2576    final AnnotationMirror observable =
2577      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME );
2578    final AnnotationMirror observableValueRef =
2579      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.OBSERVABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME );
2580    final AnnotationMirror memoize =
2581      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.MEMOIZE_CLASSNAME );
2582    final AnnotationMirror memoizeContextParameter =
2583      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.MEMOIZE_CONTEXT_PARAMETER_CLASSNAME );
2584    final AnnotationMirror computableValueRef =
2585      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPUTABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME );
2586    final AnnotationMirror contextRef =
2587      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.CONTEXT_REF_CLASSNAME );
2588    final AnnotationMirror stateRef =
2589      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_STATE_REF_CLASSNAME );
2590    final AnnotationMirror componentRef =
2591      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_REF_CLASSNAME );
2592    final AnnotationMirror componentId =
2593      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_ID_CLASSNAME );
2594    final AnnotationMirror componentIdRef =
2595      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_ID_REF_CLASSNAME );
2596    final AnnotationMirror componentTypeName =
2597      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_TYPE_NAME_REF_CLASSNAME );
2598    final AnnotationMirror componentNameRef =
2599      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_NAME_REF_CLASSNAME );
2600    final AnnotationMirror postConstruct =
2601      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME );
2602    final AnnotationMirror ejbPostConstruct =
2603      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.EJB_POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME );
2604    final AnnotationMirror preDispose =
2605      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.PRE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME );
2606    final AnnotationMirror postDispose =
2607      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.POST_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME );
2608    final AnnotationMirror onActivate =
2609      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.ON_ACTIVATE_CLASSNAME );
2610    final AnnotationMirror onDeactivate =
2611      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.ON_DEACTIVATE_CLASSNAME );
2612    final AnnotationMirror onDepsChange =
2613      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.ON_DEPS_CHANGE_CLASSNAME );
2614    final AnnotationMirror observerRef =
2615      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.OBSERVER_REF_CLASSNAME );
2616    final AnnotationMirror dependency =
2617      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME );
2618    final AnnotationMirror reference =
2619      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME );
2620    final AnnotationMirror referenceId =
2621      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME );
2622    final AnnotationMirror inverse =
2623      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME );
2624    final AnnotationMirror preInverseRemove =
2625      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_CLASSNAME );
2626    final AnnotationMirror postInverseAdd =
2627      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.POST_INVERSE_ADD_CLASSNAME );
2628    final AnnotationMirror cascadeDispose =
2629      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME );
2630
2631    if ( null != observable )
2632    {
2633      final ObservableDescriptor observableDescriptor = addObservable( descriptor,
2634                                                                       observable, method, methodType );
2635      if ( null != referenceId )
2636      {
2637        addReferenceId( descriptor, referenceId, observableDescriptor, method );
2638      }
2639      if ( null != inverse )
2640      {
2641        addInverse( descriptor, inverse, observableDescriptor, method );
2642      }
2643      if ( null != cascadeDispose )
2644      {
2645        addCascadeDisposeMethod( descriptor, method, observableDescriptor );
2646      }
2647      return true;
2648    }
2649    else if ( null != observableValueRef )
2650    {
2651      addObservableValueRef( descriptor, observableValueRef, method, methodType );
2652      return true;
2653    }
2654    else if ( null != action )
2655    {
2656      if ( null != postConstruct )
2657      {
2658        addPostConstruct( descriptor, method );
2659      }
2660      addAction( descriptor, action, method, methodType );
2661      return true;
2662    }
2663    else if ( null != observed )
2664    {
2665      addObserve( descriptor, observed, method, methodType );
2666      return true;
2667    }
2668    else if ( null != onDepsChange )
2669    {
2670      addOnDepsChange( descriptor, onDepsChange, method );
2671      return true;
2672    }
2673    else if ( null != observerRef )
2674    {
2675      addObserverRef( descriptor, observerRef, method, methodType );
2676      return true;
2677    }
2678    else if ( null != contextRef )
2679    {
2680      addContextRef( descriptor, method );
2681      return true;
2682    }
2683    else if ( null != stateRef )
2684    {
2685      addComponentStateRef( descriptor, stateRef, method );
2686      return true;
2687    }
2688    else if ( null != memoizeContextParameter )
2689    {
2690      addMemoizeContextParameter( descriptor, memoizeContextParameter, method, methodType );
2691      return true;
2692    }
2693    else if ( null != memoize )
2694    {
2695      addMemoize( descriptor, memoize, method, methodType );
2696      return true;
2697    }
2698    else if ( null != computableValueRef )
2699    {
2700      addComputableValueRef( descriptor, computableValueRef, method, methodType );
2701      return true;
2702    }
2703    else if ( null != reference )
2704    {
2705      if ( null != cascadeDispose )
2706      {
2707        addCascadeDisposeMethod( descriptor, method, null );
2708      }
2709      addReference( descriptor, reference, method, methodType );
2710      return true;
2711    }
2712    else if ( null != cascadeDispose )
2713    {
2714      addCascadeDisposeMethod( descriptor, method, null );
2715      // Return false so that it can be picked as the getter of an @Observable or linked to a @Reference
2716      return false;
2717    }
2718    else if ( null != componentIdRef )
2719    {
2720      addComponentIdRef( descriptor, method );
2721      return true;
2722    }
2723    else if ( null != componentRef )
2724    {
2725      addComponentRef( descriptor, method );
2726      return true;
2727    }
2728    else if ( null != componentId )
2729    {
2730      setComponentId( descriptor, method, methodType );
2731      return true;
2732    }
2733    else if ( null != componentNameRef )
2734    {
2735      addComponentNameRef( descriptor, method );
2736      return true;
2737    }
2738    else if ( null != componentTypeName )
2739    {
2740      setComponentTypeNameRef( descriptor, method );
2741      return true;
2742    }
2743    else if ( null != jaxWsAction )
2744    {
2745      throw new ProcessorException( "@" + Constants.JAX_WS_ACTION_CLASSNAME + " annotation " +
2746                                    "not supported in components annotated with @ArezComponent, use the @" +
2747                                    Constants.ACTION_CLASSNAME + " annotation instead.",
2748                                    method );
2749    }
2750    else if ( null != ejbPostConstruct )
2751    {
2752      throw new ProcessorException( "@" + Constants.EJB_POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME + " annotation " +
2753                                    "not supported in components annotated with @ArezComponent, use the @" +
2754                                    Constants.POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME + " annotation instead.",
2755                                    method );
2756    }
2757    else if ( null != postConstruct )
2758    {
2759      addPostConstruct( descriptor, method );
2760      return true;
2761    }
2762    else if ( null != preDispose )
2763    {
2764      addPreDispose( descriptor, method );
2765      return true;
2766    }
2767    else if ( null != postDispose )
2768    {
2769      addPostDispose( descriptor, method );
2770      return true;
2771    }
2772    else if ( null != onActivate )
2773    {
2774      addOnActivate( descriptor, onActivate, method );
2775      return true;
2776    }
2777    else if ( null != onDeactivate )
2778    {
2779      addOnDeactivate( descriptor, onDeactivate, method );
2780      return true;
2781    }
2782    else if ( null != dependency )
2783    {
2784      descriptor.addDependency( createMethodDependencyDescriptor( descriptor, method ) );
2785      return false;
2786    }
2787    else if ( null != referenceId )
2788    {
2789      addReferenceId( descriptor, referenceId, method );
2790      return true;
2791    }
2792    else if ( null != inverse )
2793    {
2794      addInverse( descriptor, inverse, method, methodType );
2795      return true;
2796    }
2797    else if ( null != preInverseRemove )
2798    {
2799      addPreInverseRemove( descriptor, preInverseRemove, method );
2800      return true;
2801    }
2802    else if ( null != postInverseAdd )
2803    {
2804      addPostInverseAdd( descriptor, postInverseAdd, method );
2805      return true;
2806    }
2807    else
2808    {
2809      return false;
2810    }
2811  }
2812
2813  private void emitWarningForUnnecessaryProtectedMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2814                                                         @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2815  {
2816    if ( method.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.PROTECTED ) &&
2817         Objects.equals( method.getEnclosingElement(), descriptor.getElement() ) &&
2818         ElementsUtil.isWarningNotSuppressed( method,
2819                                              Constants.WARNING_PROTECTED_METHOD,
2820                                              Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME ) &&
2821         !isMethodAProtectedOverride( descriptor.getElement(), method ) )
2822    {
2823      final String message =
2824        MemberChecks.shouldNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2825                                "declare a protected method. " +
2826                                MemberChecks.suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_PROTECTED_METHOD,
2827                                                           Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME ) );
2828      processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( Diagnostic.Kind.WARNING, message, method );
2829    }
2830  }
2831
2832  private void emitWarningForUnnecessaryFinalMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2833                                                     @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2834  {
2835    if ( method.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.FINAL ) &&
2836         Objects.equals( method.getEnclosingElement(), descriptor.getElement() ) &&
2837         ElementsUtil.isWarningNotSuppressed( method,
2838                                              Constants.WARNING_FINAL_METHOD,
2839                                              Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME ) )
2840    {
2841      final String message =
2842        MemberChecks.shouldNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2843                                "declare a final method. " +
2844                                MemberChecks.suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_FINAL_METHOD,
2845                                                           Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME ) );
2846      processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( Diagnostic.Kind.WARNING, message, method );
2847    }
2848  }
2849
2850  private void addReferenceId( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2851                               @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2852                               @Nonnull final ObservableDescriptor observable,
2853                               @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2854  {
2855    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2856    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
2857                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2858                                         Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME,
2859                                         method );
2860    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2861    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2862
2863    final String name = getReferenceIdName( annotation, method );
2864    descriptor.findOrCreateReference( name ).setObservable( observable );
2865  }
2866
2867  private void addReferenceId( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2868                               @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2869                               @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2870  {
2871    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2872    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
2873                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2874                                         Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME,
2875                                         method );
2876    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2877    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2878
2879    final String name = getReferenceIdName( annotation, method );
2880    descriptor.findOrCreateReference( name ).setIdMethod( method );
2881  }
2882
2883  @Nonnull
2884  private String getReferenceIdName( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2885                                     @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2886  {
2887    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
2888    final String name;
2889    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
2890    {
2891      final String candidate = deriveName( method, ID_GETTER_PATTERN, declaredName );
2892      if ( null == candidate )
2893      {
2894        final String candidate2 = deriveName( method, RAW_ID_GETTER_PATTERN, declaredName );
2895        if ( null == candidate2 )
2896        {
2897          throw new ProcessorException( "@ReferenceId target has not specified a name and does not follow " +
2898                                        "the convention \"get[Name]Id\" or \"[name]Id\"", method );
2899        }
2900        else
2901        {
2902          name = candidate2;
2903        }
2904      }
2905      else
2906      {
2907        name = candidate;
2908      }
2909    }
2910    else
2911    {
2912      name = declaredName;
2913      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
2914      {
2915        throw new ProcessorException( "@ReferenceId target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2916                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
2917      }
2918      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
2919      {
2920        throw new ProcessorException( "@ReferenceId target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2921                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
2922      }
2923    }
2924    return name;
2925  }
2926
2927  private void addPreInverseRemove( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
2928                                    @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2929                                    @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2930    throws ProcessorException
2931  {
2932    mustBeHookHook( component.getElement(),
2933                    Constants.PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_CLASSNAME,
2934                    method );
2935    shouldBeInternalHookMethod( processingEnv,
2936                                component,
2937                                method,
2938                                Constants.PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_CLASSNAME );
2939    if ( 1 != method.getParameters().size() )
2940    {
2941      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.must( Constants.PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_CLASSNAME,
2942                                                       "have exactly 1 parameter" ), method );
2943    }
2944
2945    final String name = getPreInverseRemoveName( annotation, method );
2946    findOrCreateInverseDescriptor( component, name ).addPreInverseRemoveHook( method );
2947  }
2948
2949  @Nonnull
2950  private String getPreInverseRemoveName( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2951                                          @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2952  {
2953    final String name = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
2954    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( name ) )
2955    {
2956      final String candidate = deriveName( method, PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_PATTERN, name );
2957      if ( null == candidate )
2958      {
2959        throw new ProcessorException( "@PreInverseRemove target has not specified a name and does not follow " +
2960                                      "the convention \"pre[Name]Remove\"", method );
2961      }
2962      else
2963      {
2964        return candidate;
2965      }
2966    }
2967    else
2968    {
2969      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
2970      {
2971        throw new ProcessorException( "@PreInverseRemove target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2972                                      "name must be a valid java identifier", method );
2973      }
2974      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
2975      {
2976        throw new ProcessorException( "@PreInverseRemove target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2977                                      "name must not be a java keyword", method );
2978      }
2979      return name;
2980    }
2981  }
2982
2983  private void addPostInverseAdd( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
2984                                  @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2985                                  @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2986    throws ProcessorException
2987  {
2988    mustBeHookHook( component.getElement(),
2989                    Constants.POST_INVERSE_ADD_CLASSNAME,
2990                    method );
2991    shouldBeInternalHookMethod( processingEnv,
2992                                component,
2993                                method,
2994                                Constants.POST_INVERSE_ADD_CLASSNAME );
2995    if ( 1 != method.getParameters().size() )
2996    {
2997      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.must( Constants.POST_INVERSE_ADD_CLASSNAME,
2998                                                       "have exactly 1 parameter" ), method );
2999    }
3000    final String name = getPostInverseAddName( annotation, method );
3001    findOrCreateInverseDescriptor( component, name ).addPostInverseAddHook( method );
3002  }
3003
3004  @Nonnull
3005  private String getPostInverseAddName( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
3006                                        @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
3007  {
3008    final String name = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
3009    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( name ) )
3010    {
3011      final String candidate = deriveName( method, POST_INVERSE_ADD_PATTERN, name );
3012      if ( null == candidate )
3013      {
3014        throw new ProcessorException( "@PostInverseAdd target has not specified a name and does not follow " +
3015                                      "the convention \"post[Name]Add\"", method );
3016      }
3017      else
3018      {
3019        return candidate;
3020      }
3021    }
3022    else
3023    {
3024      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
3025      {
3026        throw new ProcessorException( "@PostInverseAdd target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
3027                                      "name must be a valid java identifier", method );
3028      }
3029      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
3030      {
3031        throw new ProcessorException( "@PostInverseAdd target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
3032                                      "name must not be a java keyword", method );
3033      }
3034      return name;
3035    }
3036  }
3037
3038  private void addInverse( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3039                           @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
3040                           @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3041                           @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
3042  {
3043    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
3044    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
3045                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
3046                                         Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME,
3047                                         method );
3048    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
3049    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
3050    MemberChecks.mustBeAbstract( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
3051
3052    final String name = getInverseName( annotation, method );
3053    final ObservableDescriptor observable = descriptor.findOrCreateObservable( name );
3054    observable.setGetter( method, methodType );
3055
3056    addInverse( descriptor, annotation, observable, method );
3057  }
3058
3059  private void addInverse( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3060                           @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
3061                           @Nonnull final ObservableDescriptor observable,
3062                           @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
3063  {
3064    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
3065    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
3066                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
3067                                         Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME,
3068                                         method );
3069    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
3070    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
3071    MemberChecks.mustBeAbstract( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
3072
3073    final String name = getInverseName( annotation, method );
3074    final InverseDescriptor existing = descriptor.getInverses().get( name );
3075    if ( null != existing && existing.hasObservable() )
3076    {
3077      throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target defines duplicate inverse for name '" + name +
3078                                    "'. The other inverse is " + existing.getObservable().getGetter(),
3079                                    method );
3080    }
3081    else
3082    {
3083      final TypeMirror type = method.getReturnType();
3084
3085      final Multiplicity multiplicity;
3086      TypeElement targetType = getInverseManyTypeTarget( method );
3087      if ( null != targetType )
3088      {
3089        multiplicity = Multiplicity.MANY;
3090      }
3091      else
3092      {
3093        if ( !( type instanceof DeclaredType ) ||
3094             !AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( ( (DeclaredType) type ).asElement(),
3095                                                   Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) )
3096        {
3097          throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target expected to return a type annotated with " +
3098                                        Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME, method );
3099        }
3100        targetType = (TypeElement) ( (DeclaredType) type ).asElement();
3101        if ( AnnotationsUtil.hasNonnullAnnotation( method ) )
3102        {
3103          multiplicity = Multiplicity.ONE;
3104        }
3105        else if ( AnnotationsUtil.hasNullableAnnotation( method ) )
3106        {
3107          multiplicity = Multiplicity.ZERO_OR_ONE;
3108        }
3109        else
3110        {
3111          throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target expected to be annotated with either " +
3112                                        AnnotationsUtil.NULLABLE_CLASSNAME + " or " +
3113                                        AnnotationsUtil.NONNULL_CLASSNAME, method );
3114        }
3115      }
3116      final String referenceName = getInverseReferenceNameParameter( descriptor, method );
3117
3118      final InverseDescriptor inverse = findOrCreateInverseDescriptor( descriptor, name );
3119      final String otherName = firstCharacterToLowerCase( targetType.getSimpleName().toString() );
3120      inverse.setInverse( observable, referenceName, multiplicity, targetType, otherName );
3121      verifyMultiplicityOfAssociatedReferenceMethod( descriptor, inverse );
3122    }
3123  }
3124
3125  @Nonnull
3126  private InverseDescriptor findOrCreateInverseDescriptor( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3127                                                           @Nonnull final String name )
3128  {
3129    return descriptor.getInverses().computeIfAbsent( name, n -> new InverseDescriptor( descriptor, name ) );
3130  }
3131
3132  @Nonnull
3133  private String getInverseName( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
3134                                 @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
3135  {
3136    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
3137    final String name;
3138    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
3139    {
3140      final String candidate = deriveName( method, GETTER_PATTERN, declaredName );
3141      name = null == candidate ? method.getSimpleName().toString() : candidate;
3142    }
3143    else
3144    {
3145      name = declaredName;
3146      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
3147      {
3148        throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
3149                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
3150      }
3151      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
3152      {
3153        throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
3154                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
3155      }
3156    }
3157    return name;
3158  }
3159
3160  private void warnOnUnmanagedComponentReferences( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3161                                                   @Nonnull final List<VariableElement> fields )
3162  {
3163    final TypeElement disposeNotifier = getTypeElement( Constants.DISPOSE_NOTIFIER_CLASSNAME );
3164
3165    final Set<String> injectedTypes = new HashSet<>();
3166    if ( descriptor.isStingEnabled() )
3167    {
3168      for ( final ExecutableElement constructor : ElementsUtil.getConstructors( descriptor.getElement() ) )
3169      {
3170        final List<? extends VariableElement> parameters = constructor.getParameters();
3171        for ( final VariableElement parameter : parameters )
3172        {
3173          final boolean isDisposeNotifier = isAssignable( parameter.asType(), disposeNotifier );
3174          final boolean isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation =
3175            !isDisposeNotifier && isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation( parameter );
3176          final boolean isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent =
3177            !isDisposeNotifier &&
3178            !isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation &&
3179            isTypeAnnotatedByActAsComponentAnnotation( parameter );
3180          if ( isDisposeNotifier || isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation || isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent )
3181          {
3182            injectedTypes.add( parameter.asType().toString() );
3183          }
3184        }
3185      }
3186    }
3187
3188    for ( final VariableElement field : fields )
3189    {
3190      if ( !field.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.STATIC ) &&
3191           SuperficialValidation.validateElement( processingEnv, field ) )
3192      {
3193        final boolean isDisposeNotifier = isAssignable( field.asType(), disposeNotifier );
3194        final boolean isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation =
3195          !isDisposeNotifier && isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation( field );
3196        final boolean isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent =
3197          !isDisposeNotifier &&
3198          !isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation &&
3199          isTypeAnnotatedByActAsComponentAnnotation( field );
3200        if ( isDisposeNotifier || isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation || isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent )
3201        {
3202          if ( !descriptor.isDependencyDefined( field ) &&
3203               !descriptor.isCascadeDisposeDefined( field ) &&
3204               ( isDisposeNotifier || isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent || verifyReferencesToComponent( field ) ) &&
3205               isUnmanagedComponentReferenceNotSuppressed( field ) &&
3206               !injectedTypes.contains( field.asType().toString() ) )
3207          {
3208            final String label =
3209              isDisposeNotifier ? "an implementation of DisposeNotifier" :
3210              isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation ? "an Arez component" :
3211              "annotated with @ActAsComponent";
3212            final String message =
3213              "Field named '" + field.getSimpleName() + "' has a type that is " + label +
3214              " but is not annotated with @" + Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME + " or " +
3215              "@" + Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME + " and was not injected into the " +
3216              "constructor. This scenario can cause errors if the value is disposed. Please " +
3217              "annotate the field as appropriate or suppress the warning by annotating the field with " +
3218              "@SuppressWarnings( \"" + Constants.WARNING_UNMANAGED_COMPONENT_REFERENCE + "\" ) or " +
3219              "@SuppressArezWarnings( \"" + Constants.WARNING_UNMANAGED_COMPONENT_REFERENCE + "\" )";
3220            processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, field );
3221          }
3222        }
3223      }
3224    }
3225
3226    for ( final ObservableDescriptor observable : descriptor.getObservables().values() )
3227    {
3228      if ( observable.isAbstract() )
3229      {
3230        final ExecutableElement getter = observable.getGetter();
3231        if ( SuperficialValidation.validateElement( processingEnv, getter ) )
3232        {
3233          final TypeMirror returnType = getter.getReturnType();
3234          final Element returnElement = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( returnType );
3235          final boolean isDisposeNotifier = isAssignable( returnType, disposeNotifier );
3236          final boolean isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation =
3237            !isDisposeNotifier && isElementAnnotatedBy( returnElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
3238          final boolean isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent =
3239            !isDisposeNotifier &&
3240            !isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation &&
3241            isElementAnnotatedBy( returnElement, Constants.ACT_AS_COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
3242          if ( isDisposeNotifier || isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation || isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent )
3243          {
3244            if ( !descriptor.isDependencyDefined( getter ) &&
3245                 !descriptor.isCascadeDisposeDefined( getter ) &&
3246                 ( isDisposeNotifier ||
3247                   isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent ||
