3248                   verifyReferencesToComponent( (TypeElement) returnElement ) ) &&
3249                 isUnmanagedComponentReferenceNotSuppressed( getter ) &&
3250                 ( observable.hasSetter() && isUnmanagedComponentReferenceNotSuppressed( observable.getSetter() ) ) )
3251            {
3252              final String label =
3253                isDisposeNotifier ? "an implementation of DisposeNotifier" :
3254                isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation ? "an Arez component" :
3255                "annotated with @ActAsComponent";
3256              final String message =
3257                "Method named '" + getter.getSimpleName() + "' has a return type that is " + label +
3258                " but is not annotated with @" + Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME + " or " +
3259                "@" + Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME + ". This scenario can cause errors. " +
3260                "Please annotate the method as appropriate or suppress the warning by annotating the method with " +
3261                "@SuppressWarnings( \"" + Constants.WARNING_UNMANAGED_COMPONENT_REFERENCE + "\" ) or " +
3262                "@SuppressArezWarnings( \"" + Constants.WARNING_UNMANAGED_COMPONENT_REFERENCE + "\" )";
3263              processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, getter );
3264            }
3265          }
3266        }
3267      }
3268    }
3269  }
3270
3271  private boolean verifyReferencesToComponent( @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
3272  {
3273    return verifyReferencesToComponent( (TypeElement) processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( field.asType() ) );
3274  }
3275
3276  private boolean verifyReferencesToComponent( @Nonnull final TypeElement element )
3277  {
3278    assert SuperficialValidation.validateElement( processingEnv, element );
3279
3280    final String verifyReferencesToComponent =
3281      AnnotationsUtil.getEnumAnnotationParameter( element,
3282                                                  Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
3283                                                  "verifyReferencesToComponent" );
3284    return switch ( verifyReferencesToComponent )
3285    {
3286      case "ENABLE" -> true;
3287      case "DISABLE" -> false;
3288      default -> isDisposableTrackableRequired( element );
3289    };
3290  }
3291
3292  private boolean isUnmanagedComponentReferenceNotSuppressed( @Nonnull final Element element )
3293  {
3294    return !ElementsUtil.isWarningSuppressed( element,
3295                                              Constants.WARNING_UNMANAGED_COMPONENT_REFERENCE,
3296                                              Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME );
3297  }
3298
3299  private boolean isTypeAnnotatedByActAsComponentAnnotation( @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
3300  {
3301    final Element element = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( field.asType() );
3302    return isElementAnnotatedBy( element, Constants.ACT_AS_COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
3303  }
3304
3305  private boolean isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation( @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
3306  {
3307    final Element element = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( field.asType() );
3308    return isElementAnnotatedBy( element, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
3309  }
3310
3311  private boolean isElementAnnotatedBy( @Nullable final Element element, @Nonnull final String annotation )
3312  {
3313    return null != element &&
3314           SuperficialValidation.validateElement( processingEnv, element ) &&
3315           AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( element, annotation );
3316  }
3317
3318  private boolean isService( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
3319  {
3320    final String service =
3321      AnnotationsUtil.getEnumAnnotationParameter( typeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME, "service" );
3322    return switch ( service )
3323    {
3324      case "ENABLE" -> true;
3325      case "DISABLE" -> false;
3326      default -> AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_CONTRIBUTE_TO ) ||
3327                 AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_TYPED ) ||
3328                 AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_NAMED ) ||
3329                 AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_EAGER );
3330    };
3331  }
3332
3333  private boolean isComponentObservableRequired( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent,
3334                                                 final boolean disposeOnDeactivate )
3335  {
3336    final VariableElement variableElement = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "observable" );
3337    return switch ( variableElement.getSimpleName().toString() )
3338    {
3339      case "ENABLE" -> true;
3340      case "DISABLE" -> false;
3341      default -> disposeOnDeactivate;
3342    };
3343  }
3344
3345  private boolean isVerifyRequired( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent,
3346                                    @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
3347  {
3348    final VariableElement parameter = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "verify" );
3349    return switch ( parameter.getSimpleName().toString() )
3350    {
3351      case "ENABLE" -> true;
3352      case "DISABLE" -> false;
3353      default -> ElementsUtil.getMethods( typeElement, processingEnv.getElementUtils(), processingEnv.getTypeUtils() ).
3354        stream().anyMatch( this::hasReferenceAnnotations );
3355    };
3356  }
3357
3358  private boolean hasReferenceAnnotations( @Nonnull final Element method )
3359  {
3360    return AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( method, Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME ) ||
3361           AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( method, Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME ) ||
3362           AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( method, Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME );
3363  }
3364
3365  private boolean isEqualsRequired( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent )
3366  {
3367    final VariableElement injectParameter = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "requireEquals" );
3368    return "ENABLE".equals( injectParameter.getSimpleName().toString() );
3369  }

3371  @Nullable
3372  private String getDefaultPriority( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent )
3373  {
3374    final AnnotationValue value =
3375      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( arezComponent, "defaultPriority" );
3376    return null == value ? null : ( (VariableElement) value.getValue() ).getSimpleName().toString();
3377  }
3378
3379  private boolean isIdRequired( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent )
3380  {
3381    final VariableElement injectParameter = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "requireId" );
3382    return !"DISABLE".equals( injectParameter.getSimpleName().toString() );
3383  }
3384
3385  private boolean hasInjectAnnotation( @Nonnull final Element method )
3386  {
3387    return AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( method, Constants.INJECT_CLASSNAME );
3388  }

3390  @Nonnull
3391  private <T> T getAnnotationParameter( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
3392                                        @Nonnull final String parameterName )
3393  {
3394    return AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, parameterName );
3395  }

3397  @Nonnull
3398  private TypeElement getDisposableTypeElement()
3399  {
3400    return getTypeElement( Constants.DISPOSABLE_CLASSNAME );
3401  }
3402
3403  private boolean isDisposableTrackableRequired( @Nonnull final TypeElement element )
3404  {
3405    final String disposeNotifier =
3406      AnnotationsUtil.getEnumAnnotationParameter( element, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME, "disposeNotifier" );
3407    return switch ( disposeNotifier )
3408    {
3409      case "ENABLE" -> true;
3410      case "DISABLE" -> false;
3411      default -> null == AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( element, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) ||
3412                 !isService( element );
3413    };
3414  }

3418  {
3419    final TypeElement typeElement = findTypeElement( classname );
3420    assert null != typeElement;
3421    return typeElement;
3422  }

3428  }

3430  private boolean isAssignable( @Nonnull final TypeMirror type, @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
3431  {
3432    return processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isAssignable( type, typeElement.asType() );
3433  }

3435  private boolean isMethodAProtectedOverride( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement,
3436                                              @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
3437  {
3438    final ExecutableElement overriddenMethod = ElementsUtil.getOverriddenMethod( processingEnv, typeElement, method );
3439    return null != overriddenMethod && overriddenMethod.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.PROTECTED );
3440  }
3441
3442  private void mustBeStandardRefMethod( @Nonnull final ProcessingEnvironment processingEnv,
3443                                        @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3444                                        @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3445                                        @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
3446  {
3447    mustBeRefMethod( descriptor, method, annotationClassname );
3448    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( annotationClassname, method );
3449    shouldBeInternalRefMethod( processingEnv, descriptor, method, annotationClassname );
3450  }
3451
3452  private void mustBeRefMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3453                                @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3454                                @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
3455  {
3456    MemberChecks.mustBeAbstract( annotationClassname, method );
3457    final TypeElement typeElement = descriptor.getElement();
3458    MemberChecks.mustNotBePackageAccessInDifferentPackage( typeElement,
3459                                                           Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
3460                                                           annotationClassname,
3461                                                           method );
3462    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( annotationClassname, method );
3463    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( annotationClassname, method );
3464  }
3465
3466  private void mustBeHookHook( @Nonnull final TypeElement targetType,
3467                               @Nonnull final String annotationName,
3468                               @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
3469    throws ProcessorException
3470  {
3471    MemberChecks.mustNotBeAbstract( annotationName, method );
3472    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( targetType, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME, annotationName, method );
3473    MemberChecks.mustNotReturnAnyValue( annotationName, method );
3474    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( annotationName, method );
3475  }
3476
3477  private void shouldBeInternalRefMethod( @Nonnull final ProcessingEnvironment processingEnv,
3478                                          @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3479                                          @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3480                                          @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
3481  {
3482    if ( MemberChecks.doesMethodNotOverrideInterfaceMethod( processingEnv, descriptor.getElement(), method ) )
3483    {
3484      MemberChecks.shouldNotBePublic( processingEnv,
3485                                      method,
3486                                      annotationClassname,
3487                                      Constants.WARNING_PUBLIC_REF_METHOD,
3488                                      Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME );
3489    }
3490  }
3491
3492  private void shouldBeInternalLifecycleMethod( @Nonnull final ProcessingEnvironment processingEnv,
3493                                                @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3494                                                @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3495                                                @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
3496  {
3497    if ( MemberChecks.doesMethodNotOverrideInterfaceMethod( processingEnv, descriptor.getElement(), method ) )
3498    {
3499      MemberChecks.shouldNotBePublic( processingEnv,
3500                                      method,
3501                                      annotationClassname,
3502                                      Constants.WARNING_PUBLIC_LIFECYCLE_METHOD,
3503                                      Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME );
3504    }
3505  }
3506
3507  private void shouldBeInternalHookMethod( @Nonnull final ProcessingEnvironment processingEnv,
3508                                           @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3509                                           @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3510                                           @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
3511  {
3512    if ( MemberChecks.doesMethodNotOverrideInterfaceMethod( processingEnv, descriptor.getElement(), method ) )
3513    {
3514      MemberChecks.shouldNotBePublic( processingEnv,
3515                                      method,
3516                                      annotationClassname,
3517                                      Constants.WARNING_PUBLIC_HOOK_METHOD,
3518                                      Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME );
3519    }
3520  }
3521
3522  @Nullable
3523  private String deriveName( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3524                             @Nonnull final Pattern pattern,
3525                             @Nonnull final String name )
3526    throws ProcessorException
3527  {
3528    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( name ) )
3529    {
3530      final String methodName = method.getSimpleName().toString();
3531      final Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher( methodName );
3532      if ( matcher.find() )
3533      {
3534        final String candidate = matcher.group( 1 );
3535        return firstCharacterToLowerCase( candidate );
3536      }
3537      else
3538      {
3539        return null;
3540      }
3541    }
3542    else
3543    {
3544      return name;
3545    }
3546  }
3547
3548  @Nonnull
3549  private String firstCharacterToLowerCase( @Nonnull final String name )
3550  {
3551    return Character.toLowerCase( name.charAt( 0 ) ) + name.substring( 1 );
3552  }
3553}
